content: because i ve been busy with this dahlia fairy i won t be able to design the new flower arrangement for this week however i think the dahlia fairy would still be a lovely choice for this week kits are sold both at www plainjaneyarn com 1 and plainjane craft etsy store 2 pattern and tutoring video are free at https //www plainjaneyarn com/week-9-dahlia-reversible-fairy/ 3 please following our facebook page 4 for the latest update of the 52 weeks of flower 1 https //www plainjaneyarn com/shop/dahlia-reversible-fairy-5-6pc-crochet-kit-flower-of-week-9/ 2 https //www etsy com/listing/1732719359/dahlia-reversible-flower-fairy-5-6pcs click_key=7bfe8fcf5f38e6662b9feee3caafcade2b0724c0%3a1732719359&click_sum=8a910e6c&ref=shop_home_active_1&sts=1 3 https //www plainjaneyarn com/week-9-dahlia-reversible-fairy/ 4 https //www facebook com/plainjaneyarn/
